title: what is $this->load->view() in CodeIgniter
body:
Yes, load is a property. Think of it like this:

class Loader {
    public function view() {
        //code...
    }
}

class MyClass {
     private $load;

     public __constructor() {
         $this->load = new Loader();
     }

     public someMethod() {
         $this->load->view();
     }
}

This syntax is called chaining.
